title: Game Progress Route
content:
y it’s not a choice just anyone could make, before wincing in pain. A successful Perception check will tell you that they’re hiding their struggle to protect you. You’ll have the following options to react with:

What is it? Are you all right? Focus! Don’t you dare drop my protection. Say nothing.

A successful Insight check this time will tell you that despite her disciplined, strong demeanor, they also need some comfort. You'll have the option to give them a hug here. They’ll appreciate the ge
